price: Uzanabona abenshi muri bo (Abayahudi) bihutira kujya mu byaha, mu bugizi bwa nabi no kwaka indonke. Rwose ibyo bakora ni bibi.
arabic: وَتَرَىٰ كَثِيرٗا مِّنۡهُمۡ يُسَٰرِعُونَ فِي ٱلۡإِثۡمِ وَٱلۡعُدۡوَٰنِ وَأَكۡلِهِمُ ٱلسُّحۡتَۚ لَبِئۡسَ مَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: watarā kathīran min'hum yusāriʿūna fī al-ith'mi wal-ʿud'wāni wa-aklihimu al-suḥ'ta labi'sa mā kānū yaʿmalūna
